import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Button, OverlayTrigger, Tooltip, Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import { ChatTextFill, VolumeUpFill, GearFill, ArrowsFullscreen } from "react-bootstrap-icons"; import "../AccountsAsset/Foot.css"; export default function Foot() { const [currentDate] = useState(Date().toLocaleString()); const [support, setSupport] = useState(false); return(
